lines: 1. Ntang'ane Omotoria,'Merinda y'obogima;Neruma bosio bwane,'Bitare nabintuba,Bimbise Korw'as'ore,Ntang'ane Omotoria.
2. Nokirie emerindo,Buna ng'ina Omwana;'Merindo nekoigwere,Korayetebie "Kira,"Omogambi bw'enyancha,Ntang'ane Omotoria.
3. Ngoika ang'e n'engegu,'s'emerind' ekoruma;'sende n'omotimoko,Ko nyeegeget' as'ore,Ninkoigwe Kogontebia,"Toiroka ninkorae."
